pages.text: $(bgreen)Cabbage Pult$() is okay with launching cabbages at zombies. It's what he's paid for, after all, and he's good at it.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)100$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Huge Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that throws $(bred)one cabbage$() every 3 seconds to attack enemy.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will throw $(bred)powered cabbages$() to $(l)all surrounding enemies$().
